headline: 3 Contrarian "Buy the Dip" Picks—and One Area to Avoid
summary: Jeff Clark of TradeSmith discusses contrarian setups in oversold software, discounted Bitcoin, and Albertsons as rotation hits former leaders—plus why gold miners may be due for a pullback.

raw.headline: 3 Contrarian "Buy the Dip" Picks—and One Area to Avoid

headline: Newmont’s Ahafo North Start Adds Ghana Output To Growth Story
summary: Newmont (NYSE:NEM) has started commercial production at its Ahafo North mines in Ghana. The new operation is expected to contribute meaningfully to the company’s gold output and long term production profile. Ahafo North marks a key addition to Newmont’s portfolio in West Africa. For investors tracking Newmont at a share price of $115.32, Ahafo North adds a fresh production source to an already established gold producer. The stock shows returns of 2.6% over the past week, 6.8% over the past...

headline: Barrick: Stars Aligning For Higher Valuation
summary: Barrick Gold Corporation eyes 70% EBITDA margins, $6B FCF, and dividends via Mali restart and US spin-off at a discount with risk. Read why B stock is a buy.

headline: Jim Cramer on Investing in Newmont While Holding AEM: “No Need, You Own the Best”
summary: Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer commented on. A caller mentioned that they already own AEM shares and are now looking to invest in NEM. Cramer commented: No need, you own the best. You own the best. Own a bullion other than that, and I think you’ll be fine. Newmont Corporation […]
